message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and specifically focuses on machine translation (MT). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves the use of machine learning techniques to learn splitting rules, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely category as well. The evaluation of the methods against a gold standard involves measuring performance gains, which suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) could also be a relevant category. The paper also involves the use of corpora, which suggests that cs.IR (Information Retrieval) could be a relevant category. Finally, the use of statistical MT systems suggests that cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) could also be a relevant category.
